rules_text:
Flash
[i]Merchandise[/i] – Whenever Rennac, Rich Merchant enters or attacks, create a Treasure token.
[i]Locktouch [/i]– Whenever Rennac attacks and isn't blocked, draw a card.
[i]Evading Dance[/i] – Discard a card: Exile Rennac, Rich Merchant. You may cast him from exile for as long as he remains exiled, and only if you control a Noble.
